title: A Hitchhiker’s Guide to Doing Good
description:
Forty years ago, Merlin Clarke left his job and his life in New England to hitchhike around the country. The experience inspired him to change his life and create a one-of-a-kind trip where people can do good together.

Click here for more information on the Gap Year Bus

Follow Do Good Bus on Instagram and Twitter

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!
